title: Shared
description: After being together for 10 years Bart and Marissa are secure in their relationship and they are ready to explore some fantasies to keep their passion stoked. Marissa loves the idea of being shared with another man; she just has one condition…she gets to choose the man. Bart and Marcus have been best friends since elementary school and have shared a lot of things along the way. Now, Bart wants to share the thing that means the most to him, Marissa.Marcus agrees to Bart’s proposition. Afterwards, Marcus comes up with a proposition of his own, and the sharing gets taken to a new level.
author: Roman Hanz
